plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange sometimes.
🥗 You can eat me raw in a salad.
🐰 Rabbits think I'm yummy!

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I can be many different colors.
🐝 I help bees make honey.
🌷 People give me as gifts.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk. Birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🪵 You can make paper from me.
🌳 I give you shade on a sunny day.

plant.question: I am a red fruit that grows on a tree. Snow White liked me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I start green and turn red.
🥧 You can make a pie out of me.
⚕️ An old saying is, 'One a day keeps the doctor away.'

plant.question: I am long and green, and grow on a vine. I'm good in a salad or pickled. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am crunchy.
🥪 Some people put me on sandwiches.
🌿 You need to water me to grow

plant.question: I have sharp thorns and pretty flowers. People give me as a sign of love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹I am popular on Valentine's Day.
🥀 Be careful of my thorns!
💌 People sometimes give me with a card.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a cob!
🍿 I'm often covered in butter.
🎬 I'm a popular movie snack.

plant.question: I am a big, round vegetable with a thick, orange skin. People carve me for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I am a symbol of Fall.
👻 I can be made into a jack-o'-lantern.
🥧 My insides can be made into pie.

plant.question: I am a big tree, and my seeds are nuts. Squirrels love to hide my seeds for winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 My nuts are round and brown.
🍂 My leaves change color in the Fall.
🐿️ Squirrels love to eat my nuts!

plant.question: I am a food that grows underground. I have eyes, but I cannot see. You can fry me to make french fries. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I can be mashed.
🍟 I am yummy when fried.
🌍 I grow in the ground.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys eat me.
💛 I am the color of the sun.
🍌 You peel my skin off.

food.question: I am round and red, and sometimes green. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I grow on trees.
👩‍⚕️ Doctors don't like me.
🍎 I come in different colors, but red is most common.

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Rabbits favorite food.
🚜 I grow in the ground.
🧡 I am the color of a sunset.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies! What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 A farm animal makes me.
🥛 I am liquid.
🍪 I taste great with chocolate chip cookies.

food.question: I am small, green and grow in a pod. Sometimes I am on your plate. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a vegetable.
🟢 I am green.
🥄 You eat me with a spoon.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast, and baked in an oven. You can make a sandwich with me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You can put yummy things between me.
🔥 I am cooked in a very hot place.
🌾 I am made from wheat.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and sweet green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🟤 My skin is brown.
🥝 Birds from New Zealand share my name.
🥄 You might need a spoon to eat me.

food.question: I am a vegetable that can make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I grow underground.
😭 I make your eyes water.
🍔 You might find me on a burger.

food.question: I am a treat that is frozen and sweet. I come in many flavors and you can eat me in a cone or a cup. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am very cold.
🍦 I am often eaten in the summer.
👅 I come in chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry flavors.

food.question: I am a grain that is cooked in water and is often served with chicken or vegetables. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I am a staple food in many countries.
💧 I get soft after being cooked in water.
🥢 People in Asia often eat me with chopsticks.
